title: 神様はじめました 15 [Kamisama Hajimemashita 15]
description: Nanami has gone back in time in order to find the fallen kami who cursed Tomoe, but the past is a lot more violent than she expected. Before she can even start her search, she has to deal with suspicious villagers and a mortally wounded Tomoe!
author: Julietta Suzuki
